FinServ AccountContactRelation Custom Fi.name: FinServ AccountContactRelation Custom Fields
FinServ AccountContactRelation Custom Fi.description: Represents the relationship between an individual (specifically the contact part of the individual) and the household (account) that the individual is a member of. AccountContactRelation is a standard object that is available through the Shared Contacts feature. Custom fields extend the AccountContactRelation standard object for use in Financial Services Cloud.

DecisionMakingAuthorityType.description: Specifies the type of the decision-making authority.

DeclarationType.description: Specifies the formal manner or approach used to officially state the stakeholder's role or position.

IsDecisionMakingAuthority.description: Indicates whether the stakeholder is a decision-making authority (true) or not (false).

IncludeInGroup__c.description: Includes this account in a related individual's primary group.

IsShareholder.description: Indicates whether the stakeholder is a shareholder (true) or not (false).

Primary__c.description: Indicates the primary member of a group (true) or not (false).

PrimaryGroup__c.description: Indicates a person's primary group. You can roll up summary fields only to a personâ€™s primary group if PrimaryGroup__c is set to true.

Rollups__c.description: Records associated with the individual that are included in household roll-up summaries. Valid values: All Tasks Events Financial Accounts Assets and Liabilities Financial Goals

ShareholderHierarchyLevel.description: Specifies the hierarchical level between the account and the intermediate shareholder. The shareholder hierarchy level is applicable only to an intermediate share holder.

ShareholderType.description: Specifies the type of the shareholder.

StartDate.description: The date when the relationship between the applicant and the related applicant started.

SourceSystemId__c.description: ID that uniquely identifies the individual in an external data source.

TotalSharePercent.description: The total percentage of shares owned by the stakeholder, combining both direct and indirect ownership.
